<!--

DO NOT REPORT A SECURITY VULNERABILITY ON GITHUB ISSSUES

-->

## Do NOT report a Security Vulnerability here!!!
Email to the security group with just your contact information. Conversations will typically done privately on [Slack](https://islandora.slack.com) with the Islandora Security Response Group after a security email is sent.

Email: security@islandora.ca 


Do **NOT** submit a ticket here.

This is to warn you to not do it here.
